name: GrabACrab_SlotBonusGame
description:
This is a Bonus Game for a Slot Machine or Pull-Tab style casino game.

Select different sequences of winnings to be displayed as predetermined outcomes as you select crabs from the mini-game scene!

This game shows my abilities and some of my skills utilizing 2D art assets to create a variety of animations and UI effects. In addition to all that, this game utilizes "Modular Data Interfaces" to store and access sequence data between scenes.
